com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers

Class AbstractStyler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.ParameterizableImpl
      • com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers.AbstractStyler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable, DocumentAware, BaseStyler, Cloneable, Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddCell, AdvancedImpl, Alignment, Background, Border, ColRowSpan, DocumentSettings, Font, Height, ImageAlign, Indent, KeepTogether, Leading, Link, NewLine, NewPage, NoWrap, Padding, Rotation, Spacing, Zebra

    @Parameters(parameters={@Param(key="conditions",help="each element should point to a property declaring one or more styling conditions)",clazz=com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.StringParameter.class),@Param(key="styleafteradding",help="call the style method after an element is added to the document, default is to call it before addition.",clazz=com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.BooleanParameter.class,defaultValue="false")})
public abstract class AbstractStyler
extends com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.ParameterizableImpl
implements BaseStyler, DocumentAware
    Baseclass for stylers providing support for some general functionality such as parameters, conditions, help and Element class support.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

      • setup

        public void setup(Map<String,String> args,
         Map<String,String> settings)
        initialize a styler from defaults or arguments. Defaults are searched in properties using the concatenation of Class.getSimpleName(), a "." and the name of a setting for the styler. Subclasses of AbstractStyler will be searched starting with the actual class, ending with the direct subclass of AbstractStyler.
        Specified by:
        setup in interface com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable
        Overrides:
        setup in class com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.ParameterizableImpl
        Parameters:
        args -
